Posts.EditableText:
Hi there everybody. I'd like to know if Quest supports creating games in other languages. I tried using Russian verbs, the QDK seems to accept them but will it work in the game?
Is Quest customizable to other language parsing and grammar?
Posts.HTML:
Hi there everybody. I'd like to know if Quest supports creating games in other languages. I tried using Russian verbs, the QDK seems to accept them but will it work in the game?
Is Quest customizable to other language parsing and grammar?

Posts.EditableText: I've made one for French : http://ifiction.free.fr/quest/francais.ldf The parsing is quite rough, so I guess with Russian and its declensions, it may be difficult. Some explanations are there (in French of course) : http://ifiction.free.fr/index.php?id=quest
Posts.HTML:
I've made one for French :
http://ifiction.free.fr/quest/francais.ldf
The parsing is quite rough, so I guess with Russian and its declensions, it may be difficult.

Some explanations are there (in French of course) :

http://ifiction.free.fr/index.php?id=quest
